title: Daily Wire Backstage: Earth Day from Lockdown Edition
description:
Will the lockdown ever end? Has the government's response to the coronavirus been worse than the virus itself? What will life look like after the pandemic subsides? Does anybody even remember there's a presidential election coming up?
Join this roundtable discussion featuring Ben Shapiro, Andrew Klavan, Michael Knowles, and Daily Wire god-king Jeremy Boreing as they get to the bottom of these questions and more!
